name: io.github.VouchlyAI/pincer
description: Secure grip for your agent's secrets - security-hardened MCP gateway with proxy token architecture

environmentVariables.name: PINCER_PROXY_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Proxy token for agent authentication (generated via 'pincer agent add')

environmentVariables.name: OPENWEBUI_URL
environmentVariables.description: Optional: Base URL for OpenWebUI instance

environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_COMPATIBLE_URL
environmentVariables.description: Optional: Base URL for OpenAI-compatible instance

environmentVariables.name: AUDIT_LOG_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Optional: Custom path for audit logs (default: ~/.pincer/audit.jsonl)
